name: Dear Amelia
description:
"Dear Amelia" is a short narrative game developed in Bitsy based on a poem by Portuguese poet Fernando Pessoa called "Cartas de amor são ridículas", which translates to "Love letters are ridiculous".  

Go on a humourous journey down memory lane and find inspiration to write a letter to the love of your life.

Controls: 

WASD or arrow keys to move. 

To interact with objects, all you have to do is just walk against them. 

Hope you enjoy the game!
